stories.storyText:
[Code Name] Ceylon
[Gender] Female
[Combat Experience] No combat experience
[Place of Birth] Siesta (Independent City)
[Date of Birth] September 25
[Race] Liberi
[Height] 162cm
[Infection Status] 
Medical tests have confirmed that no infection is present.

[Physical Strength] Normal 
[Mobility] Normal 
[Physical Resilience] Normal 
[Tactical Acumen] Standard 
[Combat Skill] Standard 
[Originium Arts Assimilation] Excellent

A graduate of the Victorian National University who majored in Originium Research, she now works as an assistant researcher to Dr. Kal'tsit on her indoor research work.
She has a precocious level of master in water arts and can provide reliable treatment to allies on the battlefield.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this operator is believed to be uninfected.

[Somatic Cell-Originium Fusion Rate] 0%
Although for occupational reasons, the patient must come into extended contact with Originium, the operator has taken the appropriate steps to protect herself. As a result, she shows no sign of infection.

[Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.21u/L
The numbers are on the high side of normal, but Originium researchers do not yet believe there is anything to be concerned about.

She is a somewhat arrogant and spoiled young lady.
The reason why I say 'young lady' instead of 'researcher' is because she gives such a strong impression of a spoiled noble lady that any time she is mentioned, they will say 'Ah! That Lady!' even if they know the content of her work.
Of course, even though they'll ridicule her as 'the Lady,' there isn't anybody who actually dislikes her. This is because most of the time, she is right, and if she is wrong, she is not stingy with her apologies.

Ceylon's hometown, Siesta, is a rare independent city.
Its rareness lies not just in the fact that it's a non-nomadic city, but also that it's an independent city, and even more so in that it is currently in a state of rapid development.
In truth, on Terra, even though there are many long-established nations, nations are not a widespread concept. Independent city-states, however, are.
It should be said that in the context of the present day, the social collectives referred to by 'nation' were city-states in the past. The predecessors of several nations were independent cities gathered together. Additionally, even today, some nomadic cities that nominally belong to certain nations still to varying degrees retain the customs and traditions of the city as opposed to those of the nation.
However, it must be conceded that the concept of an independent city is falling by the wayside, although the old-fashioned and elderly might refuse to admit it. That is because the concept of a nation is more powerful.
Now, even though there is still a considerable number of independent cities on Terra, their leaders have already recognized that independent cities are no match for nations. In recent years, there have been many such independent cities that have surrendered to neighboring nations.
However, Siesta's special characteristics may be able to take them in a new direction.

In order to better facilitate understanding, Ceylon did not mention her specific area of study when introducing herself. In fact, the discipline of Originium Research has a large number of sub-categories, both in the applied area of the doctrine as well as the theoretical. Ceylon specializes in researching the history of applied development of Originium. 
Before the modern academics managed to specialize the research, many precious historical materials on Originium were not well preserved. In fact, collecting clues from past historical data to infer the paths of development of the various Originium schools was also an important part of modern Originium research.
Although today, with the development of science and technology, the study of historical materials has gradually become less concerned with the development of theory and more the verification of it. Of course, the importance of recording history itself is self-evident for the meaning of a civilization.
Naturally, although Ceylon has only just graduated from university, her intellectual reserves and enthusiasm for the study of Originium is breath-taking, and one can clearly see how much effort Ceylon put into her studies. For Rhodes Island, the addition of such an outstanding talent is a most unexpected surprise.

The reason why Schwarz's presence is not mentioned in Ceylon's file is the same reason Ceylon was not mentioned in Schwarz's.
The reason is very simple, and that's because it's simply not necessary. Words cannot be used to sufficiently describe the depth of feeling they have for one another.
However, one point that may be worth recording is that while they regard one another as the most important thing in each other's lives, their worlds are not merely limited to one another.
Ceylon still eats with other researchers, works with them, and can argue theory until the wee hours of the morning. Schwarz can independently carry out her tasks as well as hit the taverns with other mercenary operators and engage in hand-to-hand combat with them in the practice area.
They both have their own independent lives, and after joining Rhodes Island, they expanded their horizons even more. We can intuit that they will become more accustomed to this life while still remaining as important to one another as they've always been.
This could be described as a 'profound mutual affection,' with emphasis put on 'profound.'

trait.overrideDescription: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}</>

skins.description:
An outfit commonly worn by Operators.
While not as practical as a uniform, it's what they find most comfortable.

An outfit that has been improved after the Operator's Promotion.
Custom-made to suit each Operator's experiences and needs, these outfits are designed to provide them maximum flexibility on any battlefield. Furthermore, this is all done without compromising the comfort that they've come to expect.
<color name=#ffffff>MARTHE [Coral Coast] Casual Vacation Series HD49. Comfortable, relaxed, breathable, and lightweight. Allows you to enjoy a perfect beach experience in absolute relaxation.</color>

skills.desc:
Increases next healing's amount to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK. The amount will not be reduced by trait effects
<@ba.rem>Can charge for {cnt} times</>
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, each attack heals 1 additional target. While the skill is active, all allies within range gain <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

modules.desc:
Operator Ceylon has demonstrated a remarkable aptitude for wide-range healing in tandem with endowment of effects of benefit upon Operators.
The Field Operations Department has thus passed the following resolution:
This operator shall be appointed a Medic Operator during field operations to exercise Therapist responsibilities.
In witness whereof,
This badge is hereby conferred upon the above named.

On a hospital corridor bench, a student reading a book sits side by side with a middle-aged woman of professorly airs. Next to them, a distressed-looking worker anxiously mumbles to himself.
'Peter Davis.' A doctor steps out, test results in hand. The worker whose name has now been called tensely lifts his head. The student shuts her book.
'—Elevated BOCD, no signs of Oripathy.'
'Ceylon Doykos. Elevated BOCD, no signs of Oripathy.'
The three let out a collective sigh. 'See!' the student starts to tell the other woman in excitement. 'I'm fine, Professor!'
'More like you're lucky,' the professor replies sternly, shaking her head.
'I've warned you two before. Outdoor investigations are to be carried out within stipulated safe regions, during designated times, and proper protective measures have to be taken. Without specialized protective gear, coming into contact with highly activated Originium is exceedingly dangerous. Moreover, we have no right to extract ore from the mines. The mines can hold you liable for anything you've done. Ceylon, you're supposed to be a model student.'
'But I want to verify the theories I see in my textbooks... and besides, if I hadn't warned Mr. Davis and the others to halt their work, there would've been an acute infection incident. I couldn't—'
'What if you'd judged wrong?'
Ceylon stops in her tracks. After a moment, she droops her head. 'Sorry.'
'I'm not expelling you, but you will have to retake this course,' says Ceylon's professor says as she gets up from the bench. 'It was only your first field outing. Be mindful of properly protecting yourself in future.'

Once the professor has left, only then does the mine-worker nervously move to say a word of thanks.
'Thank you for saving us. I don't know if we've burdened you... Your professor sounds like she thinks you did the wrong thing.'
'No, not at all,' Ceylon replies with a smile.
'I know what my professor thinks. She just has to teach me these things as part of the course. I need to know fear, and the worst case, and I have to weigh whether the responsibility's something I can take.'
'It's when I learn all that that I can truly make my own choices.'

voice_lines.voiceText: Doctor, I'll be writing reports or reading nearby, just call when you need me.
I believe you reap what you sow, and have always followed that principle.
Wow, I never imagined Oripathy would have such a trait! This requires immediate testing… Um, Doctor, I'm sorry, but I need to leave now. Hmm, I wonder if there's a suitable subject on base…
The day is not complete without tea. Would you like a cup too, Doctor? I have the finest Victorian leaves here.
I've been with Schwarz since childhood. I know everything about her, including her past from before we met. Oh, but I won't give that up so easily, Doctor.
If I could find a cure for Schwarz, wouldn't that mean I could cure other Infected too...? Relax, Doctor, I'm not that selfish. But please also know that Schwarz is dearest to my heart.
Originium research is still a vastly unexplored territory, Doctor. But I just want to find a cure for Schwarz, which is why I longed to join Rhodes Island since I first heard of it.

Do you know, Doctor, that I despise those who discriminate against Schwarz on account of her infection alone? But here, she is accepted, and I can learn more about medicine. Coming to Rhodes Island was truly the right decision.

No matter how good a leader is, there's still a chance to be blinded by selfish interest, so you must watch out for that, Doctor. Hehe, but still, you don't need to worry that much. As long as I'm around, I'll put you back on the right path anytime you stray.
Falling asleep in a sitting position is a nasty habit, Doctor. Let me get you a blanket, at least.
Hello, I'm Ceylon, graduate of Victoria National University, with a major in Originium research. I start my internship at Rhodes Island today, with Dr. Kal'tsit's approval. Nice to meet you, Doctor.
An excellent application of Originium. Rhodes Island sure lives up to its reputation.
So I'm officially recognized by Rhodes Island? Thank you, Doctor, I'll work even harder.
Rhodes Island does boast terrific Originium research. If I keep working here, I'm sure I will cure Schwarz one day. Doctor, please help me on this path.
A mission? A perfect opportunity to test my Originium Arts.
Relax, I'm a confident commander.
I wonder if we'll find rare materials along the way?
Don't panic, handle it with composure.
Where are the wounded?
Hmm?
Leave the support work to me.
If you're wounded, don't move.
You're all free to focus on the mission.
Concentrate on the enemy ahead!
This one should be better for the present situation.
Phew... I feel like I just wrapped up a difficult experiment. It's tiring, but very fulfilling too.
The enemy should be gone now...  Alright then, I'm going to look around the perimeter.
If I were as good as Schwarz, they wouldn't have gotten away…
Don't just stand there, Doctor, give me a hand with the wounded!
Hm, maybe I could talk to the other doctors on base.
Wait, my hair is getting messed up!
Did the Doctor fall asleep in that chair again?
Arknights.

Happy New Year, Doctor. Yes, I'll go and chat with my Medical Department colleagues for a while, and then meet up with Schwarz later on. New Year's could never be more interesting at home than at Rhodes Island, and I've sent my father a card in any case.
How are you, Doctor? Care for some tea with me?

Here's your birthday present, Doctor. I know what it's like. You bury yourself in books or research, and you just can't help forgetting to take breaks. But with a tea set this beautiful by your side, I'm sure you'll be more minded to pause and brew a cup... hm? Oh, don't worry, it wasn't... terribly expensive.

I might have gained new knowledge from my predecessors' writings at university. However, only after sailing such a long course with Rhodes Island, have I truly touched on the breadth of this land, and gained all kinds of experience the books never held. Ah, and on top of that, Schwarz is doing wonderfully here. Thank you all for looking after her.

building_skills.desc: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>elite material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>80%</>
When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, <@cc.kw>Originium</> formula related productivity <@cc.vup>+35%</>
